summary: The diff does not implement the requested backend fix. Only `project_state.json` was modified to record the request as pending; no changes were made to `backend/main.mo` or any Motoko code.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the deployment-blocking Motoko compilation issue in `backend/main.mo` by ensuring `isVerifier(caller : Principal) : Bool` reliably returns a `Bool` value (specifically the result of `AccessControl.isAdmin(accessControlState, caller)`) so the canister compiles and authorization checks behave as intended wherever `isVerifier` is used.
missing_requirements.reason: No backend files were modified; there is no evidence that `isVerifier` was updated or that the referenced call sites were verified/adjusted to compile.
evidence: project_state.json (only modified file; shows REQ-1 status pending)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project tracking metadata for the request (new_feature_requests entry with REQ-1 marked pending) in `project_state.json`.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for a Motoko compilation fix in `backend/main.mo`; it does not request changes to project tracking/state files.
